name: Saving Blue
description:
Experience the struggle for survival in todays oceans.
  • Learn intuitively about a global crisis:

    Did you know that fish cant see the difference between scrap plastic and food? Learn things like this and many more by playing Saving Blue.

  • Swim just like a real fish:

    Steer the fish "Blue" through the hostile environment of a real modern, human polluted, ocean - only by controlling Blues tail fin! 

    Tricky at first - can you figure out how to escape using your fin?*

  • Survive the current state of todays oceans:

    Survive what we humans have made out of oceans. Distinguish plastic from food to eat, push through a sea full of plastic & escape a fish net hunting you down!


*The game was developed for controlling a real life fin of a fish sculpture, filled with actual waste plastic.
